About.title: Agustin Maurel
About.subtitle: Front-end Developer
About.description: I am a front-end developer with full stack knowledge, but with a lot of inclination and love for front-end. I like to work in a team, share ideas to learn and develop a product that contributes to solve any problem or need of people.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.description: Welcome to my portfolio, after 6 years working in commerce in 2020 I decided to venture into this world of programming, going from taking classes to giving them and accompanying students in their study and human process being TA's (teaching assistant). After that I had the privilege to work for start ups from their birth to product conception.
Experience.description2: I most enjoy building software in the sweet spot where design and engineering meet â€” things that look good but are also built well under the hood.

Card1.title: Front-end Dev MUSURE world
Card1.description: Development of a 3D creation tool focused on helping content creators and gamers to monetize their work, working together with design team, economics, product through SCRUM methodology In charge of the frontend.

Card2.title: Full-Stack Teach-Assistant
Card2.description: Full-Stack teacher assistant, bootcamp assistant for full-stack students. Experience where I had the opportunity to coordinate and integrate study groups, guide and assist in problem solving and promote group work. I was also able to contribute ideas for the improvement of the bootcamp.
